title.rendered: “IDF Forces Decimate Terrorist Groups in Gaza: Inside the Latest Strikes on Hamas Infrastructure and Militants”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF continues to attack throughout the Gaza Strip; Observers identified a group of terrorists who approached IDF forces in the northern Strip and were eliminated; Also eliminated were terrorist groups that fired at our forces.

The Air Force’s combat aircraft attacked in the last few hours terror infrastructures, military command centers were operated by Hamas terrorists, underground sites, and a military building from which Katyusha rockets were fired at soldiers earlier today.

IDF forces attacked a number of terrorist groups throughout the Strip, including a group that was identified by the observers of the northern brigade in the Gaza Division.

The Air Force, under the direction of the 215th fire brigade and the 454th fire brigade, eliminated two terrorist groups that fired mortar bombs at IDF forces in the Strip.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/46A0AKh

Attached is documentation from the attack on a terrorist group that was identified by observers: https://bit.ly/3RonZty
